long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your email writing with Propel, a groundbreaking tool that teaches you how to compose a professional message.

Propel walks you step by step through every part of the email and then provides suggestions to refine the message (ex: address the person with a formal title, limit the use of exclamation marks).

Install Propel, follow the advice and instantly boost the tone and quality of your emails.
